name: Prosciutto And Mozzarella Crostini
recipeIngredient: 1 baguette cut into 1/2-inch diagonal slices (or 8 slices country-style bread cut into 3-by-3-inch slices 1/2-inch thick

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Bake the slices of bread on a baking sheet until lightly browned (about 10 minutes). The slices of bread may be toasted under a broiler or on a grill instead.
Preheat broiler. Spread the slices with green-olive paste, top with slices of prosciutto and then with the mozzarella.
Broil the cheese until it melts. Serve hot.
